title: Byron: The Flawed Angel
description: The first psychoanalytic biography of Byron, the first full-length biography written by a woman, and the first complete biography published since 1957. Deals with the poet's personality, his body of work in poetry, letters, and journals, and the vast body of writing about him in memoirs, diaries, and recollections. Includes b&w illustrations. Annotation c. by Book News, Inc., Portland, Or.
author: Phyllis Grosskurth
